column5: So here's the story  My young cousin recently (within a year ) got a job with the phone Co.  Now he's a great young man and helps the old guy out lots with heavy lifting things that are harder for me to do now.  Anyway--he really likes his job at the company and feels he's very lucky  So I painted this for him as a surprise  It's 20 x 24---not titled yet
Very Cool !!!! Lineman for the County
"Up A Pole" is my suggestion. Brilliant eh?
Great work!! maybe you can call it pole dancer LOL
How bout "You Called"  Nice work Terrence
I hate to be the bearer of bad news but his shirt is on backwards! Love the painting
We'll call it artistic licence---he also is wearing a waist belt where I believe a 5 pt harness is req'd  Thanks though for the kudos
